name: Inform user of attestation request after QR code scan
scenarioId: ios/A_combined_business_scenario_on_Travel_4/Travel_Present_attestations_in_proximity-hotel_check_in_69/presentAttestations:Inform user of attestation request after QR code scan
methodName: Inform user of attestation request after QR code scan

testSteps.description: Given the user views the QR code in the wallet app
When the Relying Party device scans the QR code
Then EUDI Wallet presents a screen informing the user of the attestation request

userStory.narrative:
As a EUDI Wallet User
  I want to present the booking reservation attestations from my EUDI Wallet to the requesting Relying Party (i.e. Hotel check-in desk) in a proximity flow
  So that I can prove my booking reservation at the check-in process by the requesting Relying Party

title: Inform user of attestation request after QR code scan
